439135c366daff60762a9040bc7e788dbb8b6c95.name: GetViewer
439135c366daff60762a9040bc7e788dbb8b6c95.source:
query GetViewer {
  viewer {
    __typename
    id
    annictId
    name
    username
    avatarUrl
    description
    wannaWatchCount
    watchingCount
    watchedCount
    onHoldCount
    stopWatchingCount
  }
}
